title: Employee Data & AI Readiness Assessment
description: Individual assessment to evaluate your personal skills, experience, and readiness for data and AI initiatives.

sections.title: Personal Background & Role
sections.description: Understanding your role and background within the organization

questions.title: What is your current job title?
Which department do you work in?
How many years of professional experience do you have?
How long have you been with this organization?
How many people are in your immediate team?
Do you have management or leadership responsibilities?
options: Yes, I manage a team directly
Yes, I have project/initiative leadership responsibilities

sections.title: Technical Skills & Experience
sections.description: Assessment of your technical capabilities related to data and AI

questions.title: Which programming languages are you proficient in? (Select all that apply)
Which data analysis and visualization tools have you used? (Select all that apply)
Which database technologies have you worked with? (Select all that apply)
Which machine learning frameworks or platforms have you used? (Select all that apply)
Which cloud platforms have you worked with? (Select all that apply)
How would you rate your overall technical skill level?
options: Advanced - I can build complex solutions and mentor others
Intermediate - I can work independently on technical tasks
Basic - I can perform simple technical tasks with guidance
Non-technical - I focus on business/strategic aspects

sections.title: Data Analytics Experience
sections.description: Your experience with data analysis, interpretation, and decision-making

questions.title: How frequently do you work with data in your current role?
options: Daily - Data analysis is a core part of my job
Weekly - Regular data work as part of my responsibilities
Monthly - Occasional data analysis for projects
Rarely - Minimal data interaction in my role

questions.title: What types of data do you typically work with? (Select all that apply)
options: I don't typically work with data

questions.title: Which analytics techniques have you used? (Select all that apply)
How often do you use data to make decisions in your role?
options: Always - My decisions are primarily data-driven
Usually - I typically rely on data with some intuition
Sometimes - I use data when it's readily available
Never - My decisions are based on experience/intuition

questions.title: How confident are you in interpreting data and analytics results?
options: Very confident - I can interpret complex analyses
Confident - I understand most standard analyses
Somewhat confident - I can interpret basic analyses
Limited confidence - I need help with interpretation
Not confident - I struggle with data interpretation

questions.title: How well do you understand data quality issues and their impact?
options: Expert level - I can identify and address quality issues
Good understanding - I recognize most quality problems
Basic understanding - I know quality matters
Limited understanding - I'm learning about data quality
No understanding - Data quality is new to me

sections.title: AI & Machine Learning Experience
sections.description: Your exposure to and experience with AI and machine learning technologies

questions.title: How familiar are you with AI and machine learning concepts?
options: Expert - I design and implement AI/ML solutions
Advanced - I understand and can apply AI/ML techniques
Intermediate - I understand basic concepts and some applications
Basic - I have general awareness of AI/ML
Minimal - Limited knowledge of AI/ML concepts

questions.title: Have you been involved in any AI/ML projects?
options: Yes, I've led multiple AI/ML projects
Yes, I've been a key contributor to AI/ML projects
Yes, I've participated in AI/ML projects
Yes, I've observed or provided input to AI/ML projects
No, I haven't been involved in AI/ML projects

questions.title: Which AI/ML use cases are you familiar with? (Select all that apply)
Which AI/ML tools or services have you used? (Select all that apply)
options: AutoML platforms (Google AutoML, Azure ML, etc.)

questions.title: How familiar are you with the AI/ML model lifecycle (development to deployment)?
options: Very familiar - I understand the complete lifecycle
Familiar - I know most phases of the lifecycle
Somewhat familiar - I understand some phases
Not familiar - This is new to me

questions.title: How aware are you of AI ethics and responsible AI principles?
options: Very aware - I actively consider ethics in AI projects
Aware - I understand the importance of AI ethics
Somewhat aware - I know ethics matters in AI
Limited awareness - I've heard about AI ethics
Not aware - AI ethics is new to me

sections.title: Learning & Development
sections.description: Your learning preferences and development needs for data and AI skills

questions.title: What data/AI skills would you most like to develop? (Select all that apply)
What are your preferred learning methods? (Select all that apply)
How much time per week could you realistically dedicate to learning data/AI skills?
options: No time available for additional learning

questions.title: What support would help you learn more effectively? (Select all that apply)
options: Dedicated learning time during work hours

questions.title: Are you interested in pursuing data/AI certifications?
options: Yes, very interested in multiple certifications
Maybe, depending on relevance to my role

questions.title: How do you see data and AI skills fitting into your career aspirations?
questions.description: Please share your thoughts on how developing data and AI capabilities could impact your career goals.

sections.title: Workplace Application & Impact
sections.description: How you currently use or could use data and AI in your work

questions.title: What data-related challenges do you currently face in your work? (Select all that apply)
options: Too much data to process manually

questions.title: Where do you see the biggest opportunities for AI to improve your work or department?
questions.description: Please describe specific areas where AI could automate tasks, provide insights, or enhance decision-making.

questions.title: How often do you collaborate with data scientists, analysts, or AI specialists?
options: Daily - I work closely with data/AI teams
Rarely - Minimal interaction with data/AI teams
Never - No collaboration with data/AI specialists

questions.title: How ready are you to adopt new AI-powered tools and processes in your work?
options: Very ready - I actively seek new AI tools
Ready - I'm open to trying new AI solutions
Somewhat ready - I'll adopt with proper support

questions.title: Would you be interested in helping to train or mentor others in data/AI skills?
options: Yes, very interested in being a trainer/mentor
Maybe, depending on the time commitment

questions.title: Do you have any innovative ideas for how data or AI could be used in your organization?
questions.description: Share any creative ideas you have for applying data analytics or AI to solve business problems or create new opportunities.
